definition: branch of study/administrative section/division/field/branch/stage directions/family (taxonomy)/rules/laws/to mete out (punishment)/to levy (taxes etc)/to fine sb/CL:個|个[ge4]
(phonetic na)/used esp. in female names such as Anna 安娜[An1 na4] or Diana 黛安娜[Dai4 an1 na4]

sentences.english: How to successfully pause game in Corona SDK?
sentences.chinese: 如何成功地暫停遊戲科羅娜啤酒SDK？

sentences.english: The Coronata wallpaper lends a formal air to the dining room.
sentences.chinese: 科羅娜塔牆紙給餐廳增添了一種整齊有致的氣氛。

sentences.english: It is a mexican beer, darker than Corona with more flavour.
sentences.chinese: 墨西哥啤酒，與科羅娜比色深及風味多些。
